    Index

    A C D L M P R S U W 
    All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

    A

    askInput() - Method in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    Prompts user continuously until non-empty input is entered.

    C

    CollectionSorter - Interface in readandsort.util
    The CollectionSorter interface defines an abstract method for classes to implement integer sorting logic using different collection data types.
    createSorter(String) - Static method in class readandsort.util.SorterFactory
    Creates and returns an instance of a class that implements the interface CollectionSorter based on given sorter type.

    D

    delimiter - Variable in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    The specific delimiter for splitting string into list.
    DemoApp - Class in readandsort.app
    The DemoApp class serves as the main entry point of the read-and-sort application.
    DemoApp() - Constructor for class readandsort.app.DemoApp
     

    L

    LinkedListSorter - Class in readandsort.service
    The LinkedListSorter class represents a sorter that takes unsorted LinkedList of integers and returns it as sorted LinkedList.
    LinkedListSorter() - Constructor for class readandsort.service.LinkedListSorter
     

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class readandsort.app.DemoApp
    The main method sets up configuration and calls relevant classes to perform read-and-sort operations.
    Message - Class in readandsort.util
    The Message utility class serves as a message printer.
    Message() - Constructor for class readandsort.util.Message
     

    P

    parseList(String, String) - Method in class readandsort.service.StringToListParser
    Parses a raw string into an unsorted LinkedList of integers based on given user input and delimiter.
    printResult() - Method in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    Prints formatted result with success/warning message, the sorted list and its related collection type if it is successful.
    prompt - Variable in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    The specific prompt message for user input.
    prompt(String) - Static method in class readandsort.util.Message
    Prints a prompt message for user input with prefix ">>> " followed by given message.

    R

    readandsort - package readandsort
    Provides the classes and structures necessary to create a read-and-sort app.
    readandsort.app - package readandsort.app
    Provides main entry of a read-and-sort application - DemoApp and the application workflow controller - ReadAndSortApp.
    readandsort.service - package readandsort.service
    Contains different sorters based on collection data structures and input parsing handler - StringToListParser.
    readandsort.util - package readandsort.util
    Provides utility classes including message handler, sorter factory and sorter interface.
    ReadAndSortApp - Class in readandsort.app
    The ReadAndSortApp class serves as the application controller in related read-and-sort workflows.
    ReadAndSortApp(String, String) - Constructor for class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    Constructs a read-and-sort app with given prompt message and delimiter.
    result(String, Object) - Static method in class readandsort.util.Message
    Prints a result message combined a customized prefix with the given object.
    resultList - Variable in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    The sorted result list in a generic collection data structure created by a sorter, which implements the CollectionSorter as provided by SorterFactory.
    run(CollectionSorter, StringToListParser) - Method in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    Runs a read-and-sort workflow to get sorted integer lists into a collection structure from user input.

    S

    sort(LinkedList<Integer>) - Method in class readandsort.service.LinkedListSorter
    Implements the integer sorting logic and turns the unsorted integer LinkedList into a sorted one.
    sort(LinkedList<Integer>) - Method in class readandsort.service.StackSorter
    Implements the integer sorting logic and turns the unsorted integer LinkedList into a sorted Stack.
    sort(LinkedList<Integer>) - Method in interface readandsort.util.CollectionSorter
    The abstract sort method sorts the given LinkedList of integers and returns a sorted result list in any specific Collection data type, depending on the implementing class.
    SorterFactory - Class in readandsort.util
    The SorterFactory class generates CollectionSorter instances based on the provided sorter type.
    SorterFactory() - Constructor for class readandsort.util.SorterFactory
     
    StackSorter - Class in readandsort.service
    The StackSorter class represents a sorter that takes unsorted LinkedList of integers and returns it as a sorted Stack.
    StackSorter() - Constructor for class readandsort.service.StackSorter
     
    StringToListParser - Class in readandsort.service
    The StringToListParser class splits and parses a string into an unsorted LinkedList of integers based on given raw string and delimiter.
    StringToListParser() - Constructor for class readandsort.service.StringToListParser
     
    success(String) - Static method in class readandsort.util.Message
    Prints a success message with a success prefix followed by given message.

    U

    userInput - Variable in class readandsort.app.ReadAndSortApp
    The scanned user input.

    W

    warning(String) - Static method in class readandsort.util.Message
    Prints a warning message with a warning prefix followed by given message.
